name: The Alchemist (itch) (Fabio Marocchi)
description:
In The Alchemist you will have to defeat a huge skeletal golem. 

As an Alchemist you don't exactly excel at fighting. 

What you can do though, is combine the elements you find, imbue them with some of your life force to create something stronger and use it against your target. Never forget the Law of Equivalent Exchange.

Combine two elements and sacrifice part of your life (don't worry if you're almost dead, you won't die this way) to launch an attack, create a shield or heal yourself.

Gamepad not required but highly suggested

Note: There's a bug in the WebGL version, which only works with keyboard and mouse.
